SELECT /* [MessageService.query][listMessageData][메세지 그리드 조회][Kim Seon Ho][2018-11-28] */ M1.MSG_CD AS MSG_CD , M1.MSG_TXT AS KO , M2.MSG_TXT AS EN , M3.MSG_TXT AS VI FROM tb_sy_message M1 LEFT JOIN tb_sy_message M2 ON M1.BIZ_CD = M2.BIZ_CD AND M1.MSG_CD = M2.MSG_CD AND M2.LANG_CD = 'en' LEFT JOIN tb_sy_message M3 ON M1.BIZ_CD = M3.BIZ_CD AND M1.MSG_CD = M3.MSG_CD AND M3.LANG_CD = 'vi' WHERE 1=1 AND M1.LANG_CD = 'ko' AND M1.BIZ_CD = #{s_bizCd}
AND M1.MSG_CD LIKE '%'||#{msgCd_0}||'%'
AND M1.MSG_CD LIKE '%'||#{msgCd_1}||'%'
AND M1.MSG_CD LIKE '%'||#{msgCd_2}||'%'
AND ( M1.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_0}||'%' OR M2.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_0}||'%' OR M3.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_0}||'%' )
AND ( M1.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_1}||'%' OR M2.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_1}||'%' OR M3.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_1}||'%' )
AND ( M1.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_2}||'%' OR M2.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_2}||'%' OR M3.MSG_TXT LIKE '%'||#{msgTxt_2}||'%' )
ORDER BY M1.MSG_CD ASC
